remarks: Lemma for ~ sshaus and similar theorems.  If the topological property ` A ` is preserved under injective preimages, then a topology finer than one with property ` A ` also has property ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
t1sep.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
sshauslem.2 $e |- ( J e. A -> J e. Top ) $.
sshauslem.3 $e |- ( ( J e. A /\ ( _I |` X ) : X -1-1-> X /\ ( _I |` X ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) -> K e. A ) $.
sshauslem $p |- ( ( J e. A /\ K e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ J C_ K ) -> K e. A ) $.
